input.sentences: the canadians stood proud in the american streets !
they went on strike and decided that unless they got more money | they would n't distribute maple syrup .
this caused a huge commotion within congress . they had to make a decision .
they decided to give more money to canadians in exchange for their maple syrup .
output.sentences: A Canadian flag waved proudly in the breeze on a street corner.
A woman smiles standing near a pier, proud of the syrup strike due to an economic monetary dispute.
There was a huge decision to be made by Congress over the syrupy goodness where an end result just couldn't stick.
Canadians, know for being amiable, talked in a haughty tone outside of the capital over maple syrup and money.
Eventually a decision was made, and a woman smiled in victory.
